name: RWBY Fading Light
description:
Based on the Roosterteeth animated show RWBY. RWBY Fading Light is an action adventure Hack and Slash inspired by the mechanics of games like Hyper Light Drifter and hopes to adapt the four original character trailers, this first release is a gamified of the RED trailer

Play as Ruby Rose as she trains to become a Huntress to protect the world of Remnant against the monsters of Grimm and seek out new friends to help her along the way.

Features

-Red trailer single player demo

-Endless horde mode

-Dev Room to practice combat 

THIS GAME REQUIRES A CONTROLLER or GAMEPAD
